lyrics.text:
Mou hanga hake ā
He femāmēnite,
Ko e ngāue pe ‘a ‘Ela
Fetu’u na fulipē:
Ko e ‘Eiki Ia ‘o Natula
Ko hotau tupu’i ‘Otua.

‘Oku nau fakahā
‘A e ivi hono nima;
‘O tala he ‘ata
‘A hono naunau’ia:
Po mo e ‘aho ‘oku lea
He poto mo e ngū ‘o ‘Ela.

Ka ko e folofola
Kuo ne fakae’a,
‘Ikai ke haohaoa
Huafa ia ko ‘Ela:
Felave ai me’a fulipē
Kae hala hotau laumālie.

Mou hanga hake ā,
‘O lau he folofola;
‘Oku ne fakae’a
Huafa ko Sihova:
Huafa ka fungani ē
He lave ai ‘a e laumālie.

Me’a fakafiefia
Kuo tō mai ‘a e ‘Otua
Ko ‘Ela ai pē Ia
He ‘Eiki ‘o Natula:
Ka ko ‘IMĀNUELA foki,
SĪSŪ ko hotau kāinga ofi.
